verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הַחֹ֧דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> This month הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> This לָכֶ֖ם רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [shall be] unto you the beginning חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> of months רִאשׁ֥וֹן <S%H7223><s%> it [shall be] the first הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶ֔ם לְחָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H2320><s%> month הַשָּׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> of the year

דַּבְּר֗וּ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> ye unto all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying בֶּעָשֹׂ֖ר <S%H6218><s%> In the tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of this month הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> of this וְיִקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> they shall take לָהֶ֗ם אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to them every man שֶׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> a lamb לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אָבֹ֖ת <S%H1><s%> of [their] fathers שֶׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> a lamb לַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> for an house

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> now if יִמְעַ֣ט <S%H4591><s%> too little הַבַּיִת֮ <S%H1004><s%> And if the household מִהְיֹ֣ת <S%H1961><s%> be מִשֶּׂה֒ <S%H7716><s%> for the lamb וְלָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> take ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּשְׁכֵנ֛וֹ <S%H7934><s%> let him and his neighbour הַקָּרֹ֥ב <S%H7138><s%> next אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house בְּמִכְסַ֣ת <S%H4373><s%> [it] according to the number נְפָשֹׁ֑ת <S%H5315><s%> of the souls אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according אָכְל֔וֹ <S%H400><s%> to his eating תָּכֹ֖סּוּ <S%H3699><s%> shall make your count עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <S%H7716><s%> for the lamb

שֶׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> Your lamb תָמִ֛ים <S%H8549><s%> shall be without blemish זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> a male בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֑ם מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַכְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> [it] out from the sheep וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> or from the goats תִּקָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> ye shall take

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶם֙ לְמִשְׁמֶ֔רֶת <S%H4931><s%> And ye shall keep עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֛ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the same month הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> of the same וְשָׁחֲט֣וּ <S%H7819><s%> shall kill אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> and the whole קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> assembly עֲדַֽת־ <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> it in הָעַרְבָּֽיִם׃ <S%H6153><s%> the evening

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And they shall take מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood וְנָֽתְנ֛וּ <S%H5414><s%> and strike עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> [it] on the two הַמְּזוּזֹ֖ת <S%H4201><s%> side posts וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַמַּשְׁק֑וֹף <S%H4947><s%> and on the upper door post עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> of הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> of the houses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יֹאכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> wherein they shall eat אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָּהֶֽם׃

וְאָכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> And they shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in that night הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> he צְלִי־ <S%H6748><s%> roast אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וּמַצּ֔וֹת <S%H4682><s%> and unleavened bread עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מְרֹרִ֖ים <S%H4844><s%> [and] with bitter יֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> [herbs] they shall eat

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּאכְל֤וּ <S%H398><s%> Eat מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> any נָ֔א <S%H4995><s%> not of it raw וּבָשֵׁ֥ל <S%H1311><s%> sodden מְבֻשָּׁ֖ל <S%H1310><s%> boiled בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> at all with water כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo צְלִי־ <S%H6748><s%> but roast אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> [with] fire רֹאשׁ֥וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along כְּרָעָ֖יו <S%H3767><s%> with his legs וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along קִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> and with the purtenance

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תוֹתִ֥ירוּ <S%H3498><s%> And ye shall let nothing of it remain מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> until the morning וְהַנֹּתָ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> and that which remaineth מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of it until the morning בָּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire תִּשְׂרֹֽפוּ׃ <S%H8313><s%> ye shall burn

וְכָכָה֮ <S%H3602><s%> And thus תֹּאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> shall ye eat אֹתוֹ֒ <S%H853><s%> מָתְנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H4975><s%> it [with] your loins חֲגֻרִ֔ים <S%H2296><s%> girded נַֽעֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5275><s%> your shoes בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7272><s%> on your feet וּמַקֶּלְכֶ֖ם <S%H4731><s%> and your staff בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> in your hand וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּחִפָּז֔וֹן <S%H2649><s%> it in haste פֶּ֥סַח <S%H6453><s%> passover ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> it לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> it [is] the LORD'S

וְעָבַרְתִּ֣י <S%H5674><s%> For I will pass בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> through the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> this night הַזֶּה֒ <S%H2088><s%> he וְהִכֵּיתִ֤י <S%H5221><s%> and will smite כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מֵאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> both man וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and beast וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> and against all the gods מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> I will execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> judgment אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> will befall הַדָּ֨ם <S%H1818><s%> And the blood לָכֶ֜ם לְאֹ֗ת <S%H226><s%> shall be to you for a token עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> over הַבָּתִּים֙ <S%H1004><s%> upon the houses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וְרָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> where ye [are] and when I see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood וּפָסַחְתִּ֖י <S%H6452><s%> I will pass עֲלֵכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> over וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> will befall בָכֶ֥ם נֶ֙גֶף֙ <S%H5063><s%> over you and the plague לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <S%H4889><s%> shall not be upon you to destroy בְּהַכֹּתִ֖י <S%H5221><s%> [you] when I smite בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become הַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And this day הַזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> now this לָכֶם֙ לְזִכָּר֔וֹן <S%H2146><s%> shall be unto you for a memorial וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <S%H2287><s%> and ye shall keep אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> חַ֣ג <S%H2282><s%> it a feast לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> by an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever תְּחָגֻּֽהוּ׃ <S%H2287><s%> ye shall keep it a feast

שִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days מַצּ֣וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> shall ye eat אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> even בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the first תַּשְׁבִּ֥יתוּ <S%H7673><s%> ye shall put away שְּׂאֹ֖ר <S%H7603><s%> leaven מִבָּתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> out of your houses כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <S%H398><s%> for whosoever eateth חָמֵ֗ץ <S%H2557><s%> leavened bread וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> that soul הַהִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> off from Israel מִיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרִאשֹׁ֖ן <S%H7223><s%> from the first עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> until the seventh

וּבַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרִאשׁוֹן֙ <S%H7223><s%> And in the first מִקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [there shall be] an holy וּבַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> and in the seventh מִקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> convocation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> there shall be an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> to you no manner of work לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shall be done בָהֶ֔ם אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> in them save אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what יֵאָכֵ֣ל <S%H398><s%> must eat לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [that] which every man ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> that לְבַדּ֖וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone יֵעָשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> that only may be done לָכֶֽם׃

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֮ <S%H8104><s%> And ye shall observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּצּוֹת֒ <S%H4682><s%> [the feast of] unleavened bread כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּעֶ֙צֶם֙ <S%H6106><s%> for in this selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <S%H3318><s%> have I brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִבְאוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> your armies מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֞ם <S%H8104><s%> therefore shall ye observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1755><s%> in your generations חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> by an ordinance עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

בָּרִאשֹׁ֡ן <S%H7223><s%> In the first בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> of the month בָּעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even תֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> ye shall eat מַצֹּ֑ת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> until י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָאֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> until the one וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month בָּעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> at even

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days שְׂאֹ֕ר <S%H7603><s%> shall there be no leaven לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall be no יִמָּצֵ֖א <S%H4672><s%> found בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> in your houses כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <S%H398><s%> for whosoever eateth מַחְמֶ֗צֶת <S%H2557><s%> leaven וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> even that soul הַהִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> from the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> whether he be a stranger וּבְאֶזְרַ֥ח <S%H249><s%> or born הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything מַחְמֶ֖צֶת <S%H2557><s%> leaven לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall eat בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹשְׁבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> in all your habitations תֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> shall ye eat מַצּֽוֹת׃ <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread פ
